snippet.title: Traffic (C64) gameplay
snippet.description:
I was surprised that i couldn't find a video about this great C64 game. So here is one. Not a walkthrough, i haven't made it to the end ever.

 It was developed by Novotrade in 1984. The creators were: 
Nagy Csaba
Bohus Géza
Beleznai Ferenc
Korányi Gábor
Beleznai Éva

 I took the credits from this Checkpoint podcast (it's in Hungarian): 
https://iddqd.blog.hu/2022/03/03/checkpoint_8x02_traffic_es_scarabaeus_a_novotrade_ket_korai_sikere

  Here is an article in Hungarian about that while in Europe almost noone could complete the levels (just like me now), Japanese testers suggested car crashes and ambulance cars for the MSX conversion to make the game harder.
http://enterpriseforever.com/konvertalas/re-cpc-programok-atirasa-768/?action=dlattach;attach=8504;image

 Among being a funny and challenging game, it is technically amazing: Around a hundred cars are going on their own ways at full framerate! In 1984 on a C64.
